Name: Rabbit Simulator
About the game: Hello everyone, I love Bunny. One day my head suddenly asked me, why not make a full 3D bunny game? I thought about it and thought it was a good idea, so this game was born. This is a simple and relaxing bunny walking simulator game. Your only goal is to collect as many carrots as possible. Game Features Warm game atmosphere. A wide variety of bunny customization options, including body and skin. Can physically interact with carrots. Steam achievements support. Steam leaderboard support. Game Play Eat when you are hungry. Collect carrots constantly. Give the other rabbits a carrot and lead the other rabbits to run around.
